Coagulopathy in APL — risk of bleeding & thrombosis

 Mechanisms:
• ↑ Tissue Factor (TF) on blasts → triggers DIC 
• ↑ Annexin II → activates tPA/uPA → hyperfibrinolysis 
 High WBC → ↑ risk
 Early ATRA + supportive care saves lives

#APL #Leukemia #Hematology
